channel.title: Youth Development Projects on Real Charitable Trust
channel.description: Recent content in Youth Development Projects on Real Charitable Trust

item.title: Youth Development Projects
item.description: Tapping the potentials of youth force is very crucial for the holistic development of the Nation. RCT works with the youth of the Nation who are in need of quality education, skills development, health, personality development, etc. The trust educates the youth for taking up major social and entrepreneurial roles in the society through carrier guidance and leadership training programs. Our trust is dedicated to imparting moral values, ethics, skills, etc.
